page.title: 04FARMING WELBURY &DEIGHTON
page.content: The average size of farm in the area is 150-200 acres. The main types of farms are Arable & Dairy with pigs & poultrey on some smaller farms. Wheat,barley and some oil seed rape are the main arable crops.The Dairy stock is mainly Fresians with some Holstiens.The herd sizes are betweem 40 & 100 cows,but are being reduced,or dispersed due to imposed milk quotas. Silage is made in a clamp also a round baler and preserved in big plastic bags for winter stockfeed. Tractors are between 50-100 horsepower, Combine Harvesters,Power Harrows,Round & Square Balers and Seed Drills are the main implements on the Arable Farms. Added to this list are Mower Conditioners,Precision Chop Forage Harvesters.Rotary Spreaders and Fertilizer Distributers for the Dairy Farms.Some farms still make hay.
